item.title: UnitRots: Unitary rotations of two-dimensional fields using the discrete and finite model of the su(2) oscillator.
item.author: Author
item.description: Introduction UnitRotsis a public repository containing the algorithms to transform (rotate) two-dimensional fields, aka. pixellated images. The implementation is done in Julia language. This plain manual aims to describe the functions and outputs of the software source. Theoretical background For a theoretical description of the transformation, go to the references within Research. API

item.title: IntrinsicDecoherence: Dynamical evolution of quantum mechanical systems
item.author: Author
item.description: Introduction IntrinsicDecoherenceis a public repository containing the algorithmic implementation of the analytical foundations discovered about the dynamical evolution in quantum mechanical systems. The implementation is done in Julia language. This plain manual aims to describe the functions and outputs of the software source. Theoretical background For a theoretical description of the transformation, go to the references within Research. API
